# [`remotes::install_cran()`]{.blue}	
###	[`remotes::install\_cran`]{.blue}`("*thingy*")`{.center}
# What it does
	+ A better way to add packages is to use the .blue[`install_cran()`] function from the .blue[`remotes`] package.	
# Demo code
	```{r, eval=FALSE}	remotes::install_cran("DOPE")	```	Paste that line into the Console windowpane (bottom left corner) and tap the return or enter key on your keyboard.	
# Useful stuff
	+ It will check to see the package has been updated before it bothers to do the download.	---
